post.title: QOTD – Jim Dial
post.content:
I’m giving credit to Jim Dial for this quote since he told it to me, but he did say someone told him. I just don’t remember who…

“The difference between a hallucination and a vision is how many other people can see it”
post.excerpt: I’m giving credit to Jim Dial for this quote since he told it to me, but he did say someone told him. I just don’t remember who… “The difference between a hallucination and a vision is how many other people can see it”

comments.name: Richard Veryard
comments.content:
Here’s a quote from Richard Bandler (co-founder of NLP). “There are people called civil engineers who hallucinate for a living. They see a road where there isn’t one and measure it!”
http://www.openexchange.org/archives/Classics/bandler.html
